sentences.sContent: Bird evolved from reptiles, so the first bird must have come out of an egg--laid by a reptile.
sentences.sContent_eng: Bird evolved from reptiles, so the first bird must have come out of an egg--laid by a reptile.
sentences.sCn: 禽类是由爬虫类进化而来，所以，第一只禽鸟肯定是从爬虫类孵化的蛋里出来的。

trans.tranOther: a type of animal, such as a snake or  lizard  , whose body temperature changes according to the temperature around it, and that usually lays eggs to have babies
